overview: Born of a Dream, a musical salute to the Centennial of Flight. Written, produced and performed by members of the Air Force Band, the musical ran for five consecutive performances at the National Theatre in Washington with cast and crew drawn from the band itself. The two-act musical is set in the fictitious town of Wrightsville and follows a ‘big-city’ newspaper reporter as he discovers the history and beauty of flight.
tagline: A musical salute to the Centennial of Flight
title: Born of a Dream
